definition: an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal, to perform a ceremonious bow
details:
noun
- an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal
= synonyms: conge
- formal permission to depart
= synonyms: conge
- (architecture) a concave molding
= synonyms: conge
- a Chinese rice gruel eaten for breakfast
verb
- to perform a ceremonious bow
= synonyms: conge
- to depart after obtaining formal permission
= example: to depart after obtaining formal permission
